name: hivemq
description: HiveMQ is a MQTT broker designed for the fast, efficient and reliable bi-directional movement of data between device and the cloud.
postInstallNotes:
HiveMQ is being installed!
Note that this service runs in evaluation mode by default.
Default configuration: 3 cluster nodes | 4 CPU cores | 4GB RAM

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/hivemq
